feed.title: Noah Turner
feed.subtitle: A minimal, responsive, and powerful Jekyll theme for presenting professional writing.

entry.title: Welcome!
entry.summary: Welcome! This post serves as two things - firstly, as a test post to make sure all of my config works, and as a brief introduction to what the purpose of website is exactly. This website is most likely to be used as a blog - said blog will contain any analysis of current tech news I do, as well as a record of any projects that I do (such as this website). Other than that, we’ll see what happ...
